title: Divorcees.biz
description: Despite their different personalities, Connie, Sadie, Jenny, and Lucy have been friends for years. Frustrated that they may never find Mr. Right, four divorced women decide to risk their savings to set up an online dating agency. But there's a it's for divorcees only. With so much on the line, will Divorcees.biz be the answer to their problems? or the beginning of a whole lot more? And who will be the first to find their Prince Charming.
author: Eileen Thornton
